text: The largest in-field Study of #Chloroquine (CQ) & #Hydroxychloroquine (HCQ) in #France, showed efficacy against #COVID19 of 91.7% if used within 3days of diagnosis. The tragedy of #CQ was that it was endorsed by the worst husk of effluvia, immorality & evil on #Earth, Trump! https://t.co/0AFpnFRHaE
